lead_paragraph: The Blue Cross-Blue Shield health insurer Anthem is suing the pharmacy benefits manager Express Scripts over prescription drug prices.

headline.print_headline: Anthem Sues Express Scripts Over Cost of Prescriptions
headline.main: Anthem Sues Express Scripts Over Cost of Prescriptions

snippet: The Blue Cross-Blue Shield health insurer Anthem is suing the pharmacy benefits manager Express Scripts over prescription drug prices.
abstract: Anthem sues Express Scripts, which runs insurer's prescription drug coverage, citing failure to operate in good faith; is seeking to recover money it says it lost after Express Scripts set prices higher than competitive benchmarks.
